snippet: Many people have a love-hate relationship with complaining. It can be satisfying, but people who constantly whine about the same thing can be annoying.
abstract: Alina Tugend Shortcuts column on complaining; suggests that while complaining can be satisfying, it should be done with purpose and not constantly, which can be annoying; if used sparingly, complaining can be useful, effective tool
lead_paragraph: Many people have a love-hate relationship with complaining. It can be satisfying, but people who constantly whine about the same thing can be annoying.

headline.seo: The Satisfaction, and Annoyance, of Complaining
headline.main: Complaining Is Hard to Avoid, but Try to Do It With a Purpose
headline.print_headline: Complaining Is Hard to Avoid, but Try to Do It With a Purpose
